definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: deliver up, deliver (denom. fr. [[מָגֵן]]; on connex. of meanings cf. [[סָגַר]] )— Pf. [[מִגֵּן]] Ge 14:20; Impf. 3 fs. sf. [[תְּמַגְּנֶ֑ךָּ]] Pr 4:9 [[אֲמַגֶּנְךָ]] Ho 11:8; —deliver up to adversary Ge 14:20; Ho 11:8 + Is 64:6 LXX SyrVer Targum Ew Che al. [[וַתְּמַגְּנֵּנוּ]] for MT [[וַתְּמגֵנוּ]]; also deliver, give, c. acc. & sf. of indirect obj. Pr 4:9.
